Arabic.Name: العصر
Lines: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ

English.Name: Al-'Asr
Lines: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience

Turkish.Name: ASR
Lines: İyiliği sonsuz, ikramı bol Allah’ın adıyla,
